attributes.description:
If you are looking for a quality Pre-Owned Vehicle then look no further.  
Book a test drive today to experience this vehicle.  Delivery can be arranged nationwide. Price excludes admin and delivery fee. Finance can be arranged on premises and trade- ins are welcome.
We at Wingfield Motors Bellville strive for perfection, so that you as the customer can make the most of each moment and opportunity while shopping for the perfect vehicle to suit your needs so please do take a stroll on our showroom floor. 
We give you peace of mind knowing that every vehicle is subject to a stringent Check List.  
You are welcome to speak to one of our Finance consultants for a tailored financial package to suite your needs or one of our Sales Executives, to help with all your vehicle requirements.
